item.title: タッカー・カールソンは2日の動画で、テレビで行われる「ほとんどのディベート」がいかに信じられないほど愚かか、そして「真のものが勝つ」ことについて曖昧な発言をした（Zack Sharf/Variety）
item.description:
Zack Sharf / Variety:
In a video on Wednesday, Tucker Carlson gave a vague statement about “how unbelievably stupid most of the debates” on TV are and how “true things will prevail”  —  In a video posted to Twitter on Wednesday, Carlson delivered a vague speech in which he spoke about what it's …

item.title: Comcast、第1四半期の売上高は前年同期比4.3%減の$297B、純利益は同8%増の$3.9B、メディア収入は$6.15B、Peacockは加入者22M、損失$704M (Lillian Rizzo/CNBC)
item.description:
Lillian Rizzo / CNBC:
Comcast reports Q1 revenue down 4.3% YoY to $29.7B, net income up 8% YoY to $3.9B, and $6.15B media revenue; Peacock has 22M subscribers and $704M in losses  —  - Comcast's first quarter earnings beat Wall Street's expectations.  — Still, the company saw a drop in its residential broadband subscribers …

item.title: アンディ・ウォーホル財団対ゴールドスミス事件（SCOTUS前のフェアユース事件）は、AIツールが人間の作った作品に対してできることに著作権法がどのように適用されるかに影響を与える可能性がある（Madeline Ashby/Wired)
item.description:
Madeline Ashby / Wired:
How Andy Warhol Foundation v. Goldsmith, a fair use case before SCOTUS, could impact how copyright law is applied to what AI tools can do with human-made works  —  The US Supreme Court's upcoming decision could shift the interpretation of fair use law—and all the people, and tools, that turn to it for protection.

item.title: WSJ、WaPo、NYTは、エヴァン・ガーシュコビッチ氏の解放のために戦う米国政府からの支援を促す共同全面広告を全国版に掲載する（Sara Fischer/Axios）
item.description:
Sara Fischer / Axios:
The WSJ, WaPo, and NYT will run a joint full-page ad in their national editions urging support from the US government in fighting for Evan Gershkovich's release  —  The publishers and top editors at the Wall Street Journal, Washington Post and New York Times on Thursday will run a joint letter …

item.title: 情報筋の話：DraftKingsは、同社がスポンサーを務めるポッドキャストの動画を配信する無料の広告付きビデオストリーミングサービスを開始する予定で、今後数週間でデビューする見込みだ（Gerry Smith/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Gerry Smith / Bloomberg:
Sources: DraftKings plans to launch a free, ad-supported video streaming service with videos of podcasts the company sponsors, expected to debut in coming weeks  —  DraftKings Inc. is planning to launch its own streaming video service, the latest evidence that sports betting and media are converging.

item.title: Metaの開発・番組制作責任者Mina Lefevreがレイオフで退社へ、MetaがFacebook Watch Originalsを閉鎖、最後の番組「Red Table Talk」を終了 (Deadline)
item.description:
Deadline:
Mina Lefevre, Meta's head of development and programming, to exit amid layoffs, as Meta shutters Facebook Watch Originals and ends its last show, Red Table Talk  —  EXCLUSIVE: Mina Lefevre, who was Head of Development and Programming at Meta, is departing Facebook's parent company.

item.title: Timeは、2011年に開始したデジタルペイウォールを2023年6月1日から完全に撤去する計画で、ペイウォールの撤去に伴い有料会員権は失効する（Sara Fischer/Axios）。
item.description:
Sara Fischer / Axios:
Time plans to fully remove its digital paywall, which was launched in 2011, starting on June 1, 2023; paid subscriptions will expire when the paywall is removed  —  Time is fully removing its digital paywall beginning June 1, its CEO Jessica Sibley told Axios.

item.title: 情報源はこちらペーパーマガジンが4月28日付でスタッフを解雇、編集業務を停止するが閉鎖はしない、EICのジャスティン・モランは5月まで残留（Mark Stenberg/Adweek）
item.description:
Mark Stenberg / Adweek:
Sources: Paper Magazine lays off its staff, effective April 28, and stops its editorial operations but is not closing; EIC Justin Moran will remain through May  —  The iconic title hopes to avoid closure  —  The staff of Paper Magazine, the music and cultural publisher made famous by the 2014 …

item.title: コグニザントのYouTube Music契約者がAlphabet Workers Unionとの組合結成に投票、AlphabetはGoogleを共同雇用主とする判決を不服としている（Josh Eidelson/Bloomberg)
item.description:
Josh Eidelson / Bloomberg:
YouTube Music contractors from Cognizant vote to unionize with the Alphabet Workers Union; Alphabet is appealing a ruling that Google is their joint employer  —  The majority of a group of YouTube contract staff in Texas have voted to unionize in a labor victory that could force parent company Alphabet Inc …

item.title: Roku、第1四半期の売上高は前年同期比1%増の$741M、プラットフォーム売上高は同1%減の$635M、ストリーミング時間は同20%増の251B、アクティブアカウントは同17%増の716M（Todd Spangler/Variety）
item.description:
Todd Spangler / Variety:
Roku reports Q1 revenue up 1% YoY to $741M, platform revenue down 1% YoY to $635M, streaming hours up 20% YoY to 25.1B, and active accounts up 17% YoY to 71.6M  —  Users streamed a record high of 3.9 hours per active account per day during the quarter, company says

item.title: Netflixは、2020年から2023年にかけて、英国で番組や映画を制作するために約$6Bを費やす予定で、これは同社が当初予想していたよりも「50%近く多い」（Jesse Whittock/Deadline）。
item.description:
Jesse Whittock / Deadline:
Netflix plans to spend almost $6B producing shows and films in the UK from 2020 through 2023, or “nearly 50% more” than the company originally anticipated  —  Netflix will have invested almost $6BN in UK content over four years by the end of 2023, the streamer has revealed.

item.title: Steinman familyがLNP Media Groupをペンシルバニア州の公共放送局WITFに寄付する計画、LNPは公益法人になる予定（Chad Umble/LancasterOnline)
item.description:
Chad Umble / LancasterOnline:
The Steinman family plans to donate LNP Media Group to WITF, a public broadcasting station in Pennsylvania; LNP is set to become a public benefit corporation  —  The Steinman family's 158-year ownership of a daily newspaper in Lancaster will end in June with a gift meant to safeguard the future of its flagship publication.

item.title: カンターNetflixは2023年第1四半期にスペインで1M以上の加入者を失い、第4四半期の解約の3倍、解約した人の3分の2は他人のパスワードを使っていた（Bloomberg)
item.description:
Bloomberg:
Kantar: Netflix lost 1M+ subscribers in Spain in Q1 2023, or triple the cancellations in Q4; two-thirds of those who canceled were using someone else's password  —  Netflix Inc. lost more than one million users in Spain in the first three months of 2023 according to market research group Kantar …

item.title: フォックスニュース、27億ドル訴訟でルパート・マードック、ラクラン・マードックら幹部に関する追加資料を投票技術会社スマートマティックに渡すことで合意（マーシャル・コーエン／CNN）。
item.description:
Marshall Cohen / CNN:
Fox News agrees to give voting tech company Smartmatic additional documents about Rupert Murdoch, Lachlan Murdoch, and other top executives in the $2.7B lawsuit  —  New York CNN —  —  Fox News has agreed to give voting technology company Smartmatic additional documents …

item.title: Tubiの創業者でCEOのFarhad Massoudi氏が退社、Foxはデジタル事業を再編し、Fox CTOのPaul Cheesbrough氏が率いるTubi Media Groupを設立（Nellie Andreeva/Deadline)
item.description:
Nellie Andreeva / Deadline:
Tubi founder and CEO Farhad Massoudi leaves the company; Fox restructures its digital operations and forms the Tubi Media Group, led by Fox CTO Paul Cheesbrough  —  Fox Corporation is restructuring its digital operations by forming the Tubi Media Group as Farhad Massoudi …
